Articles.Content: Hi, I was wondering if there is anyway to remove the space junk off the map or start a new game because it\'s incredibly annoying >![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Go to Settings -> Gameplay and under \'System\' set the \'Max persistent debris\' slider to zero.

If you want to \'start a new game\', just delete the \'persistent.sfs\' file located in \*your ksp folder\*/saves/default
Also, if you want to remove specific debris, you can go in and edit the persistent.sfs file (it\'s just a text file)
Or blast it out of the sky with the laser cannon. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I have made a mod called FL-C2000 tank!

[mod]That's very nice StellarUniverse, I'm sure you are proud ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) But this thread is for ideas for clearing space junk, not mods.[/mod]
